Description:
In the corner of the large corridor you come across some kind of ancient machine.

After examining it for a while, it seems that the machine is intended to train the user's memory and coordination.

Although you are not quite sure... you deduce that playing the machine must give some kind of reward.
DescriptionAction: Do you want to play a game?
